Package com.example.blackbox.inventory

Class InventoryAddEditFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.blackbox.AddEditFragment
com.example.blackbox.inventory.InventoryAddEditFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, AttachImageFragment.OnImageSelectedListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
InventoryAddFragment, InventoryEditFragment
public abstract class InventoryAddEditFragment extends AddEditFragment implements AttachImageFragment.OnImageSelectedListener
Fragments of this class allow the user to input information relating to and item This is an abstract class with two subclasses, one relating to adding items and one related to editing items
